title: Business Development
responsibilities: Develop and manage the Job Tracker for all ISP-related activities
Coordinate with cross-functional teams to deliver project updates and resolve operational issues
Supervise and update the logistics and goods flow process for ISP operations
Maintain and regularly update the ISP Project Budget Plan

title: Document Controller
responsibilities: Manage and organize project documentation effectively
Ensure accuracy and completeness of controlled documents
Maintain records for compliance and operational needs

title: Administrative
responsibilities: Coordinate with field technicians to obtain evidence of VSAT and M2M device installation and replacement
Maintain administrative records and reports
Utilize Microsoft Office tools for documentation

title: Machine Learning Cohort
company: Bangkit Academy led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
responsibilities: Selected as one of 4,650 cohorts from 57,000+ participants in MBKM Flagship Program
Specialized in Machine Learning using TensorFlow
Collaborated in team projects to apply ML models to real-world problems

title: Network Operations Center
responsibilities: Monitor network performance and availability using monitoring tools
Perform routine maintenance such as software updates, patch installations, and hardware replacements
Coordinate with vendors and service providers for maintenance and support
Collaborate with network engineers to implement network changes and upgrades

title: File Clerk
responsibilities: Verify land title documents across South Tangerang City for accuracy and validity
Organize and archive land title documents systematically for easy retrieval

title: Commerce & Procurement Intern
responsibilities: Collect and organize event-related documents such as activity reports
Compile minutes of events based on provided documents and information
Ensure accuracy of event minutes including dates, times, venues, and sequences
Coordinate with relevant teams for confirmation and approval of minutes content
Input minutes into company's designated system or format
Perform other administrative tasks as instructed by the supervisor
